title: Validate obsidian-headless Docker build
description: CI triggered on push. Verify the image builds successfully on GitHub Actions, is published to ghcr.io/cameronsjo/obsidian-headless, and has build provenance attestation.

title: Add content filtering before Anthropic API calls
description: Vault diffs sent to Anthropic for commit messages contain raw note content. Strip lines matching common secret patterns (password, api_key, token, Bearer, etc.) from diffs before sending. Consider max diff size limit. Ref: docs/threat-model.md TB-1, TE-1, Scenario 2.

title: Validate Obsidian CLI and Sync post-migration
description: After deployment, verify headless container is functional: CLI responds, vault accessible, Sync active, backup sidecar getting change events. Risk: Sync auth may need re-auth if credentials not preserved in volume.

title: Implement MCP bearer token authentication
description: obsidi-mcp should require a bearer token even when behind Agentgateway (defense in depth). If no token is configured, refuse to start or log a loud warning every 60 seconds. Ref: docs/threat-model.md TA-1, TA-2.

title: Move secrets to Docker secrets
description: RESTIC_PASSWORD and ANTHROPIC_API_KEY are plain environment variables. Migrate to Docker secrets or a secrets manager. Ref: docs/threat-model.md TB-5.

title: Deploy headless Obsidian to Unraid
description: Push homelab infra changes to swap linuxserver/obsidian VNC image for cameronsjo/obsidian-headless. Bosun auto-deploys on push. Changes already written to homelab repo.

title: Document no-auth risk prominently in README
description: The no-auth deployment risk is buried in docs/mcp-integration.md. Add a visible security callout in README.md Quick Start section warning that deploying without auth exposes full vault read/write to the network. Ref: docs/threat-model.md TA-1.

title: Write OBaaS documentation (sync-setup, mcp-integration, architecture)
description: Create docs/ with setup guides referenced from README: sync-setup.md, mcp-integration.md, architecture.md. Can be written after deployment validates the actual sync auth flow.
close_reason: Created sync-setup.md and mcp-integration.md. Architecture.md already existed. TODOs flagged for post-deployment validation.

title: Add MCP read-only mode for untrusted agents
description: obsidi-mcp should support a configurable write-mode (read-only vs read-write). Untrusted agents get read-only access. Ref: docs/threat-model.md TH-2, TH-3, Scenario 1.

title: Bind obsidi-mcp to localhost by default
description: docker-compose MUST NOT expose MCP ports to the network without auth in front. obsidi-mcp should bind to localhost only. Ref: docs/threat-model.md TA-1, Scenario 3.

title: Build obsidi-claude MCP server
description: Decouple MCP server from current obsidian-mcp (REST API). New obsidi-claude uses Obsidian CLI. New repo, Docker image, optional service in obaas compose. Deferred from initial session.

title: Pin plugin versions in headless container
description: Community plugins in obsidi-headless should never auto-update. Pin to specific versions via volume mounts. Audit plugins before version bumps. Ref: docs/threat-model.md TH-6, Scenario 4.
